mapper.sql: w.id,w.status, w.workID, w.positionID, w.sort, w.createBy, w.createTime, w.updateBy, w.updateTime, w.version, w.isDeleted

where 1=1 and w.id = #{condition.id} and w.workID = #{condition.workID} and w.positionID = #{condition.positionID} and w.sort = #{condition.sort} and w.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and w.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and w.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and w.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and w.version = #{condition.version} and w.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and w.status = #{condition.status}

where 1=1 and w.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(w.workID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.workID}),'%')) and UPPER(w.positionID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.positionID}),'%')) and UPPER(w.sort) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.sort}),'%')) and UPPER(w.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(w.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(w.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(w.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(w.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%'))
mapper.update: update workposition set workID=#{workID}, positionID=#{positionID}, sort=#{sort}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, status=#{status}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from workposition w where w.id = #{id} and w.isDeleted = false
mapper.sql: w.id as 'id', w.version as 'version',w.workID as 'workID',w.positionID as 'positionID',w.sort as 'sort', positionSH.id as 'positionSH.id', positionSH.version as mapper.select: select from workposition w left join position positionSH on w.positionID = positionSH.id left join localtioninfo workPlace on positionSH.workPalce = workPlace.id left join city city on workPlace.cityID = city.id left join label labelList on positionSH.id = labelList.positionID left join shiro_user positionUser on positionSH.userID = positionUser.id left join attachment attachment on positionUser.infoHeadImg = attachment.id left join weixin weixin on positionUser.id = weixin.userID left join localtioninfo gather on positionSH.aggregate = gather.id AND positionSH.open in (${condition.open}) AND positionSH.type = 0 AND positionSH.isDeleted = 0 AND w.status = #{condition.status} AND w.workID = #{condition.workID} AND w.id = #{condition.id} ${orderByClause}
